languages.text: "Хейдари, вы в чем именно усомнились — в надежности подданных Золотого Трона или решениях Лорд-капитана? Лучше погодите с ответом и обдумайте его как следует".
"Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."
languages.original_text: "Хейдари, вы в чем именно усомнились — в надежности подданных Золотого Трона или решениях Лорд-капитана? Лучше погодите с ответом и обдумайте его как следует".

traits.locale_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “你到底在怀疑什么事情，海达利？是在怀疑黄金王座代理人是否可信？还是在怀疑舰长大人的决定？这个问题你最好仔细考虑清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: “你到底在怀疑什么事情，海达利？是在怀疑黄金王座代理人是否可信？还是在怀疑舰长大人的决定？这个问题你最好仔细考虑清楚。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Heydari, ¿qué está poniendo en duda, exactamente? ¿La credibilidad de los súbditos del Trono Dorado, o las decisiones de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? Piense bien antes de responder».
languages.original_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: «Heydari, ¿qué está poniendo en duda, exactamente? ¿La credibilidad de los súbditos del Trono Dorado, o las decisiones de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? Piense bien antes de responder».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヘイダリ、お前が疑っているのは一体何なのだ…？黄金の玉座の臣下たちの信頼性か、それともロード・キャプテンの決断なのか？答えは、時間をかけてじっくり考えるがいい」
languages.original_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイダリ、お前が疑っているのは一体何なのだ…？黄金の玉座の臣下たちの信頼性か、それともロード・キャプテンの決断なのか？答えは、時間をかけてじっくり考えるがいい」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Heydari, de quoi doutez-vous, exactement ? De la crédibilité des sujets du Trône d'Or, ou des décisions {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Je vous conseille de bien réfléchir à votre réponse. »
languages.original_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: « Heydari, de quoi doutez-vous, exactement ? De la crédibilité des sujets du Trône d'Or, ou des décisions {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Je vous conseille de bien réfléchir à votre réponse. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Heydari, woran genau zweifelt Ihr? And der Glaubwürdigkeit der Untertanen des Goldenen Throns oder an den Entscheidungen des Lord Captains? Nehmt Euch Zeit, Eure Antwort gründlich zu überdenken."
languages.original_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: "Heydari, woran genau zweifelt Ihr? And der Glaubwürdigkeit der Untertanen des Goldenen Throns oder an den Entscheidungen des Lord Captains? Nehmt Euch Zeit, Eure Antwort gründlich zu überdenken."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Heydari, acaba tam olarak hangi konuda şüpheye düştün? Altın Taht'ın kullarının güvenilirliğinden mi yoksa Lord Kaptan'ın kararlarından mı kuşku duyuyorsun? Cevap vermeden iyice düşünmeni isterim."
languages.original_text: "Heydari, what exactly is it you are doubting — the credibility of the subjects of the Golden Throne or the Lord Captain's decisions? Take some time to carefully consider your answer."

traits.locale_text: "Heydari, acaba tam olarak hangi konuda şüpheye düştünüz? Altın Taht'ın kullarının güvenilirliğinden mi, yoksa Lord Kaptan'ın kararlarından mı? Cevap vermeden iyice düşünmenizi isterim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
